title: Analysis of e-Learning Practices and Strategic Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and instructional operations experience
context.additional_context: Analysis of e-learning trends and development of actionable strategies for administrators/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can classify e-learning practices into five categories (instructional design strategies, measurement, individual/group programs, Web 2.0) and analyze case studies.
Learners can propose at least three simulation/VR-based instructional design strategies applicable in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).
Learners can select five indicators for measuring e-learning effectiveness within organizations and design implementation plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
